publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-997 Mr David Davidson: Diabetes UK—That the Parliament notes the British Diabetics Association’s change of name to Diabetes UK to coincide with National Diabetes Week beginning on 12 June 2000; recognises its achievements in Scotland, and offers its encouragement in its future endeavours to maximise support for Scottish diabetics and their families.
S1M-997 Diabetes UK (lodged on 12 June 2000) David Mundell*, Shona Robison*
S1M-997 Diabetes UK (lodged on 12 June 2000) Christine Grahame*
S1M-997 Diabetes UK (lodged on 12 June 2000) Mr John McAllion*

S1M-997 Mr David Davidson: Diabetes UK—That the Parliament notes the British Diabetics Association’s change of name to Diabetes UK to coincide with National Diabetes Week beginning on 12 June 2000; recognises its achievements in Scotland, and offers its encouragement in its future endeavours to maximise support for Scottish diabetics and their families. Supported by: David Mundell, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Mr John McAllion, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-997 Diabetes UK (lodged on 12 June 2000) David McLetchie*
S1M-997 Diabetes UK (lodged on 12 June 2000) Irene McGugan*, Michael Russell*, Pauline McNeill*, Richard Lochhead*
S1M-997 Diabetes UK (lodged on 12 June 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*, Phil Gallie*, Robert Brown*, Alex Fergusson*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Karen Whitefield*
S1M-997 Diabetes UK (lodged on 12 June 2000) Cathy Jamieson*

S1M-997 Mr David Davidson: Diabetes UK—That the Parliament notes the British Diabetics Association’s change of name to Diabetes UK to coincide with National Diabetes Week beginning on 12 June 2000; recognises its achievements in Scotland, and offers its encouragement in its future endeavours to maximise support for Scottish diabetics and their families. Supported by: David Mundell, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Mr John McAllion, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Jamie McGrigor, David McLetchie, Irene McGugan, Michael Russell, Pauline McNeill, Richard Lochhead, Mr Adam Ingram, Phil Gallie, Robert Brown, Alex Fergusson, Mr Michael McMahon, Karen Whitefield, Cathy Jamieson

S1M-997 Diabetes UK (lodged on 12 June 2000) Andrew Wilson*

S1M-997 Mr David Davidson: Diabetes UK—That the Parliament notes the British Diabetics Association’s change of name to Diabetes UK to coincide with National Diabetes Week beginning on 12 June 2000; recognises its achievements in Scotland, and offers its encouragement in its future endeavours to maximise support for Scottish diabetics and their families. Supported by: David Mundell, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Mr John McAllion, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Jamie McGrigor, David McLetchie, Irene McGugan, Michael Russell, Pauline McNeill, Richard Lochhead, Mr Adam Ingram, Phil Gallie, Robert Brown, Alex Fergusson, Mr Michael McMahon, Karen Whitefield, Cathy Jamieson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Andrew Wilson

S1M-997 Diabetes UK (lodged on 12 June 2000) Dr Winnie Ewing*
